Title: Relates to step therapy protocol
Summary: Relates to health care plans for step therapy protocol; amends effective date to January 1, 2026.
LawCode: Amd §§4902 & 4903, Ins L; amd §§4902 & 4903, Pub Health L; amd §5, Chap of 2024 (as proposed in S.1267-A & A.901-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to step therapy protocol; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2024 amending the insurance law and the public health law, relating to requiring a utilization review agent to follow certain rules when establishing a step therapy protocol, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 1267-A and A. 901-A, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
